page.title: 08The Owners of Hexton Manor
page.content: Hexton Parish consists of about 1500 acres and is contained within the Hexton Manor Estate which is a little larger. The Ashley Cooper family bought the estate 50 years ago and Mr Ashley Cooper has farmed and administered it for 17 years. His family live in Hexton Manor, an ancient country house with 10 bedrooms. Village people, and organisations with an interest in the area, are frequently welcomed to the Manor, its extensive gardens and ornamental lake. Mrs Ashley Cooper enjoys living in the village where she knows everyone. She supports the Recreation Club, the Women's Institute, the Youth Club and the Red Cross. She plays the organ in Church and arranges the weekly services with the visiting Vicar. She is Chairman of the School Governors.
